summary: Allows you to summon a \"Spectral\" Dwarven Sphere.
descriptionHtml:
This is basically a mod I made for myself out of boredom, I didn\'t intend to publish it at first but I decided to anyway.
This is my first mod, But I\'ve gotten positive feedback on Steam Workshop.
I hope you enjoy this mod.
Feel free to upload an image of you using this mod if you\'d like :D

~~INSTRUCTIONS~~
You can purchase the spell from Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach.
IMPORTANT: This mod makes 2 spell tomes but the one you want to buy is \"Summon Spectral Sphere\"
author: ImPulsezZx
